name: Michael W. HORTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Horton v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Michael W. HORTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of May, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
950 A.2d 261
Michael W. HORTON, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 8, 2008.
